amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the U.S. should seek to obtain cooperation from other nations in discovering and monitoring near-Earth asteroids.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-707 to express the sense of Congress that the U.S. should seek to obtain cooperation from other nations in discovering and monitoring near-Earth asteroids.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Feeney amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
